barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: Masters of rage, the barbarians unleash their primal fury on the battlefield.

bard.name: Bard
bard.description: Versatile performers and spellcasters, bards weave magic through their music and charm.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description: Divine servants and healers, clerics draw power from their chosen deity to aid allies and smite foes.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Guardians of nature, druids commune with the elements and shape-shift into powerful beasts.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: Masters of combat, fighters excel in martial prowess and adaptability.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Disciplined warriors, monks harness their inner energy for unparalleled speed and agility.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: Holy knights, paladins combine martial skill with divine magic to uphold justice.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Skilled trackers and survivalists, rangers excel in both archery and wilderness lore.

rogue.name: Rouge
rogue.description: Masters of stealth and cunning, rogues are skilled infiltrators and deadly assassins.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: Innate spellcasters, sorcerers wield magical power flowing through their bloodline.

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.description: Pact-bound spellcasters, warlocks forge mysterious deals for otherworldly powers.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: Arcane scholars, wizards study ancient tomes to command the forces of magic.
